bibl.title: Excavation, Dating and Content of Two Tombs in Daphne, Odos Olgas 53, Athens 1.
bibl.note: A preliminary version of this paper was published as: Egert Pöhlmann & Martin L. West, The Oldest Greek Papyrus and Writing Tablets: Fifth-Century Documents from the 'Tomb of the Musician' in Attica, ZPE 180 (2012) pp. 1-16, 6 pll. - 1. Excavation of the Tombs, Restoration and Transfer of the Content to the Archaeological Museum of Piraeus. - 2. Contents and Date of Tomb I. - 3. Contents and Date of Tomb II. - Avec résumés en anglais et en italien.
bibl.seg: Egert Pöhlmann, Excavation, Dating and Content of Two Tombs in Daphne, Odos Olgas 53, Athens 1.
Greek and Roman Musical Studies 1 (2013) pp. 7-24, 10 pll. coul.

A preliminary version of this paper was published as: Egert Pöhlmann & Martin L. West, The Oldest Greek Papyrus and Writing Tablets: Fifth-Century Documents from the 'Tomb of the Musician' in Attica, ZPE 180 (2012) pp. 1-16, 6 pll. - 1. Excavation of the Tombs, Restoration and Transfer of the Content to the Archaeological Museum of Piraeus. - 2. Contents and Date of Tomb I. - 3.
